```{r setup}
library(dataCleaner)
```

```{r}
tibble::tibble(
  date = c("20190101", "20190305", "20201012"),
  numeric_val = c(1, NA, 5),
  char_val = c("", "val ", "-")
) -> sample_table

sample_table
```

```{r}
sample_table %>% 
  clean_frame 
```

```{r}
sample_table %>% 
  fill_na(where(is.numeric))
```
